title: Gamification-Based MOOC Engagement Enhancement and Dropout Prevention Strategies

context.additional_context: A non-degree online program for in-service professionals to strengthen scientific job competencies. Operates a formative assessment-centered feedback system.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 70% learning continuity by participating in real-time sessions at least three times weekly by the fourth week.
Learners earn a cumulative total of 15 or more badges through gamification tasks by the end of the course
Learners achieve an 80% or higher completion rate in formative assessments linked to the reward system
Learners enhance social interaction by collaborating with peer learners on three or more collaborative tasks during the course
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
